mapper.select:
select a.issue_id , a.issue_title , a.issue_cont ,TO_CHAR( a.reg_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_dt, a.todo_id , b.mem_name as mem_id, a.category_id, a.issue_kind
from( select issue_id, issue_title, issue_cont, reg_dt , issue_del, mem_id, category_id, issue_kind, todo_id from issue where issue_id = #{issueId} ) a , member b where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.issue_del = 'N'
select todo_title, todo_id from todo where mem_id = #{memId} and req_id = #{reqId}

select a.category_id, a.category_name from category a, (select substr(mem_type,1,1) as mem_type from member where mem_id = #{memId}) b where substr(a.category_auth,1,1) in( b.mem_type, 'M') order by a.category_id

select count(*) as totCnt from issue where req_id = #{reqId} and issue_del = 'N'
AND mem_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND issue_title LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND issue_cont LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
